name: Super Security
description:
Utopia is under threat! With scoundrels, gangsters, and revolutionaries sowing seeds of terror, the peace and prosperity of our time is about to be lost. It is up to the Super Security force to take down these rag-tag Forces of Terror once and for all!

Requires a play board (no smaller than 11x12 inches), pencils and paper, 6 six-sided dice, 10 miniatures (5 for Super Security, 5 for Forces of Terror), 5 1x1 inch numbered door markers, 8 1x1 inch reinforcement markers, 3 1x1 inch numbered breach markers, 3 2x1 inch cover pieces, 4 1x1 inch cover pieces, and 1 1x1 inch objective marker.

(Mood Board downloadable with game rules)
